Original:
提供一個輕鬆、自在且不受外在影響的環境。
主要提供為生啤、特調、烈酒，餐點由負責人依照當日食材以及客人狀況提供（不能說是精緻，但絕對能感受到用心）
主要以類招待所的方式經營，並有提供包場的服務！很推薦多人群體來這邊
如果是一個人且喜歡高歌交 以及 玩飛鏢的朋友，這裡絕對是適合的場所，不僅自己能玩的開心，也會遇到跟自己同樣喜歡這兩類娛樂的好朋友。
這邊的特色是讓來自各方不同的客人，進到此處就好像都變成一群相識許久共同同樂的朋友~真的就猶如來到了Neverland
EN:
Provide an environment that is relaxed, comfortable and unintentional.
It mainly provides raw beer, special tuning, and spiritual wine. The person in charge is provided by the person in charge according to the ingredients and guest status (it cannot be said to be exquisite, but you can definitely feel the intention)
Mainly operate in the way of hospitality, and there are services to provide charter!Recommended many people to come here
If you are a person who likes Gao Singjiao and playing with a darts, it is definitely a suitable place here. Not only can you play happily, you will also meet good friends who also like these two types of entertainment with yourself.
The characteristics here are that different parties from all parties come into this place. It seems that they have become a group of friends who have known each other for a long time. It really seems like I came to NEVERLAND
